abstract: <正>2024年10月7日,湖北能特科技股份有限公司公告,该公司于2024年9月30日召开第七届董事会第二十二次会议,审议通过《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目的议案》,同意公司之全资子公司能特科技有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目。该项目建设地点在湖北荆州开发区,项目建设期为自项目批准后不超过15个月。项目全部建设完成并达产后,每年新增30%～100%化学法回收聚酯系列产品共计100 kt。
ZH_EN: On October 7, 2024, Hubei Nengte Technology Co., Ltd. announced that at the 22nd meeting of its 7th Board of Directors held on September 30, 2024, the company approved the "Proposal on Investment in a 100 kt/a Chemical Recycled Polyester Project by Fully-Owned Subsidiary Nengte Technology Co., Ltd." The board agreed to allow its fully-owned subsidiary Nengte Technology Co., Ltd. to invest RMB 350 million using self-raised funds in the 100 kt/a chemical recycled polyester project. The project will be located in Jingzhou Development Zone, Hubei Province, and its construction period will not exceed 15 months from the date of approval. Once completed and operating at full capacity, the project will annually add 100 kt of chemically recycled polyester products, representing an increase of 30% to 100% in the company's chemical recycling production series.
EN_ZH: 2024年10月7日，湖北能特科技股份有限公司发布公告称，公司于2024年9月30日召开的第七届董事会第二十二次会议审议通过了《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资建设10万吨/年化学法再生聚酯项目的议案》。董事会同意公司全资子公司能特科技有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资建设10万吨/年化学法再生聚酯项目。项目选址位于湖北省荆州开发区，建设周期自项目获批之日起不超过15个月。该项目建成满产后，公司每年将新增10万吨化学法再生聚酯产品，公司的化学回收系列产品产能将提高30%至100%。

abstract: <正>2024年10月7日,湖北能特科技股份有限公司公告,该公司于2024年9月30日召开第七届董事会第二十二次会议,审议通过《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目的议案》,同意公司之全资子公司能特科技有限公司使用自筹资金3.5亿元人民币投资100 kt/a化学回收聚酯项目。该项目建设地点在湖北荆州开发区,项目建设期为自项目批准后不超过15个月。项目全部建设完成并达产后,每年新增30%～100%化学法回收聚酯系列产品共计100 kt。
ZH_EN: On October 7, 2024, Hubei Nengte Technology Co., Ltd. announced that the company's 22nd meeting of the seventh board of directors, held on September 30, 2024, reviewed and approved the "Proposal on the Investment of a 100 kt/a Chemical Recycling Polyester Project by the Wholly-Owned Subsidiary Nengte Technology Co., Ltd.", agreeing that its wholly-owned subsidiary Nengte Technology Co., Ltd. will invest RMB 350 million in self-raised capital into a 100 kt/a chemical recycling polyester project. The project site is located in Jingzhou Development Zone, Hubei province, with a construction period not exceeding 15 months from project approval date. Upon full completion and production commencement, the project will annually produce an additional 100 kt of chemically recycled polyester series products, with chemical recycling content between 30% to 100%.
EN_ZH: 2024年10月7日，湖北能特科技股份有限公司公告，公司于2024年9月30日召开的第七届董事会第22次会议审议通过了《关于全资子公司能特科技有限公司投资建设10万吨/年化学循环聚酯项目的议案》，同意其全资子公司能特科技有限公司以自筹资金人民币3.5亿元投资建设10万吨/年化学循环聚酯项目。该项目选址于湖北省荆州开发区，自项目获批之日起建设周期不超过15个月。项目全部建成投产后，每年将新增10万吨化学循环聚酯系列产品，产品中化学循环成分占比为30%-100%。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical English is a form of technical English that integrates English language skills with professional chemical knowledge, specifically used to describe theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena related to the chemical field. It is a fundamental course designed to enhance the preparation of university students majoring in chemistry-related disciplines for jobs in the chemical industry. Many of the instruments and equipment used in the chemical industry are imported from overseas, with their instructions, operational manuals, and structural parameters provided in English. As a result, the chemical industry requires a large number of qualified talents who possess both specialized knowledge and proficiency in professional English. Vocational colleges serve as important centers for cultivating highly skilled technicians for frontline industrial positions. The advantages of project-based teaching align well with the educational needs of chemical technology-related professional English courses at vocational colleges, enhancing teaching effectiveness and relevance, improving students' mastery of chemical professional English, and facilitating their smooth transition into the workforce.
EN_ZH: 化工英语是一种将英语语言技能与专业化学知识结合的科技英语形式，专门用于描述化工领域相关的理论、技术、实验、工艺和现象。它是一门基础课程，旨在加强高校化学类专业学生的专业准备，以满足化工行业就业需求。由于化工产业中大量仪器设备均从国外进口，其说明书、操作手册以及结构参数均采用英文，因此化工行业亟需大量既具有专业知识又熟练掌握专业英语的合格人才。职业院校是培养工业一线高技能技术人员的重要基地。项目化教学的优势与职业院校化工技术类专业英语课程的教育需求高度契合，可以提高教学效果及针对性，增强学生对化工专业英语的掌握程度，并有助于学生顺利进入职场。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemical professional English is a branch of scientific and technological English integrating English language skills with chemical expertise. It specifically describes theories, technologies, experiments, processes, and phenomena related to the chemical field, serving as a foundational course for students in chemical-related majors at universities to enhance their competencies for positions in the chemical engineering industry. Numerous pieces of equipment used in the chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from abroad, and their manuals, structural parameters, and specifications are provided in English. Consequently, the chemical industry requires large numbers of talented professionals proficient in both specialized knowledge and relevant English skills. Vocational colleges are key institutions for training high-quality, technically skilled personnel for front-line production roles. A project-oriented teaching approach aligns well with the educational requirements of chemical technology-related professional English courses in vocational colleges, improves teaching relevance and effectiveness, enhances students’ mastery of chemical professional English, and assists them in smoothly adapting to their future job positions.
EN_ZH: 化工专业英语是集英语语言技能和化学专业知识于一体的科技英语分支，专门描述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、工艺和现象，是高校化工类专业学生加强自身能力，以胜任化工行业岗位的一门基础课程。目前化工及化学工程行业使用的大量设备均为国外进口，其设备使用说明书、结构参数和技术指标均以英文形式提供，化工行业因此需要大量具备专业知识同时拥有英语能力的优秀人才。职业院校是培养适应生产一线需要的高素质技术技能型人才的重要基地。项目导向的教学方式符合职业院校化工技术类专业英语课程的教学需求，能增强教学的针对性和有效性，提高学生对化工专业英语的掌握程度，帮助学生顺利适应未来的工作岗位。

abstract: <正>化学专业英语是英语与化学专业知识结合的一门科技英语,专门用来阐述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、过程及现象,是提升高校化学类相关专业学生从事化工领域岗位的基础性课程。化学化工行业使用的众多设备都是从国外引进的,设备使用说明书、结构参数等都是英文版的。这使得化学化工行业需要大量既懂专业知识又掌握专业英语技能的优秀人才。高职院校是培养生产一线高素质技术型人才的主阵地,项目化教学的优势符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程教学的需要,提高教学的针对性与实效性,提高学生化工专业英语的掌握程度,帮助他们顺利融入工作岗位。
ZH_EN: Chemistry Professional English is a form of technical English that integrates English language with chemical expertise, specifically used to describe theories, techniques, experiments, processes, and phenomena related to the field of chemistry. It serves as a foundational course for university students majoring in chemistry-related disciplines, equipping them for roles in the chemical engineering sector. Many facilities and equipment used in chemical and chemical engineering industries are imported from abroad, with user manuals, structural parameters, and documentation often provided in English. Consequently, the chemical industry needs a large number of skilled professionals who possess both technical knowledge and proficiency in specialized English. Vocational colleges serve as the primary institutions for cultivating high-quality technical personnel prepared for frontline positions in production. A project-based teaching approach aligns well with the teaching requirements of chemical technology-related professional English courses in higher vocational colleges. This approach enhances the specificity and effectiveness of instruction, improves students' mastery of chemical engineering English, and helps them smoothly integrate into the workplace.
EN_ZH: 化工专业英语是一种结合英语语言与化工专业知识的技术性英语，专门用于描述化学领域相关的理论、技术、实验、工艺及现象。它是高校化工类专业学生的一门基础课程，旨在为他们进入化工行业领域的工作岗位做好准备。许多化工和化学工程行业所使用的设备及设施均从国外进口，其手册、结构参数以及相关文件通常均以英语提供。因此，化工行业需要大量兼具专业技术知识与熟练专业英语能力的高质量人才。职业院校是培养生产一线高素质技术人才的主要阵地。基于项目的教学方法很好地符合高职院校化工技术类专业英语课程的教学要求，有助于增强教学的针对性和实效性，提高学生对化工英语的掌握程度，帮助其顺利融入职场。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are unparalleled by any chemical knowledge in history. The separation between chemistry and philosophy has become increasingly pronounced, and chemistry itself has transitioned from macroscopic research to microscopic processes, and from static to dynamic studies. Against this backdrop, many renowned chemists, from various research perspectives, have profoundly recognized the significant role philosophical thought plays in advancing chemistry. More and more chemical researchers have begun consciously applying the principles of dialectical materialism philosophy to guide their chemical studies. Likewise, philosophers show keen interest in the progress of chemistry, reflecting on the philosophical questions raised during its development. Consequently, the philosophy of chemistry emerged as an interdisciplinary field located at the intersection of chemistry and philosophy. This new discipline differs both from ancient natural philosophy and from the "chemical philosophy" discussed by chemists in modern times.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度达到了历史上任何化学知识都无法比拟的程度。化学与哲学之间的区分日益明显，化学本身也已由宏观研究转向微观过程，由静态研究转向动态考察。在此背景下，许多著名化学家从不同的研究视角深入认识到哲学思想在促进化学发展方面发挥的重要作用。越来越多的化学研究人员开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理指导其化学研究。同时，哲学家们对化学的进步表现出浓厚兴趣，反思化学发展过程中所引发的哲学问题。因此，化学哲学作为一个处于化学与哲学交汇处的跨学科领域应运而生。这一新学科既不同于古代的自然哲学，也不同于近代以来化学家所探讨的“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are incomparable to those of historical chemistry. Chemistry is becoming more profoundly differentiated from philosophy, transitioning from macroscopic to microscopic study, and evolving from static toward dynamic investigation. Against this backdrop, many renowned chemists, from varying research perspectives, have deeply recognized the significance of philosophical thought for the advancement of chemistry. Increasingly, chemical researchers are consciously applying dialectical materialist philosophical principles to guide their chemical investigations. Philosophers, too, closely follow chemistry's progress, reflecting upon questions posed to philosophy by chemistry's development. Philosophy of chemistry thus emerged as an interdisciplinary field at the intersection of chemistry and philosophy, differing both from ancient natural philosophy and the so-called "chemical philosophy" discussed by chemists in modern times.
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度与广度都是历史上的化学所不能比拟的。化学日益深入地从哲学中分化出来，从宏观转向微观的研究，从静态发展到动态的探索。在此背景下，许多著名化学家从不同的研究角度出发，深刻认识到哲学思维对化学进步的重要意义。越来越多的化学研究者主动自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理指导自己的化学研究。同时，哲学家也密切关注着化学的进步，反思着化学发展向哲学提出的问题。因此，化学哲学渐渐作为一个处于化学与哲学交叉点上的跨学科领域浮现出来，既不同于古代的自然哲学，也不同于现代化学家所讨论的所谓“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>现代化学的复杂程度、深度和广度都是历史上的化学所无法比拟的。化学同哲学的分化日益深刻,化学自身也由宏观研究进入了微观研究,从静态研究发展到动态研究。在这样的背景下,许多著名的化学家从不同的研究角度,深刻地理解到哲学思想对于化学发展的重要意义。越来越多的化学工作者开始自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理来指导自己的化学研究。哲学家们也在十分关注着化学的进展,思考着化学在发展过程中向哲学提出的问题。化学哲学作为化学与哲学的交叉学科应运而生,这一学科既不同于古代的自然哲学,也不同于近代化学家们所说的“化学哲学”。
ZH_EN: The complexity, depth, and breadth of modern chemistry are unparalleled by any chemistry in history. Chemistry and philosophy have become increasingly differentiated, with chemistry itself moving from macroscopic to microscopic studies and evolving from static to dynamic research. In this context, many renowned chemists, from various research perspectives, have deeply recognized the significant role philosophical thought plays in the development of chemistry. More and more chemists consciously apply dialectical materialist philosophical principles to guide their chemical research. Philosophers are also paying close attention to chemical advancements and considering the philosophical questions posed by chemistry during its development. Philosophy of chemistry has emerged as an interdisciplinary field bridging chemistry and philosophy, distinct from ancient natural philosophy and also different from what modern chemists previously referred to as "chemical philosophy."
EN_ZH: 现代化学的复杂性、深度和广度是历史上任何时期的化学所无法比拟的。化学与哲学的分化日益明显，化学本身也从宏观研究转向微观研究，从静态研究转向动态研究。在这种背景下，不同研究视角的许多著名化学家都深刻认识到哲学思想对化学发展的重大作用。越来越多的化学家自觉地运用辩证唯物主义哲学原理指导化学研究。同时，哲学家也在密切关注化学的发展，并思考其发展过程中提出的哲学问题。化学哲学作为连接化学与哲学的跨学科领域出现，既不同于古代自然哲学，也有别于现代化学家以往所称的“化学哲学”。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the advancement of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of athletic fatigue and overtraining have become crucial research directions for improving athletes' competitive performance and preventing injuries. Sports biochemistry contributes significantly to the scientific diagnosis of fatigue and overtraining by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activities, and endocrine indicators within the body during physical activity. "Sports Biochemistry" thoroughly examines how exercise affects biochemical markers in various populations, including track athletes, elderly individuals, children, and the general population. In particular, research regarding energy metabolism and balance offers new insights into identifying cumulative fatigue and overtraining. Such biochemical testing methods not only enhance scientific approaches to sports but also provide reliable support for the athletes' long-term health and efficient training.
EN_ZH: 随着运动科学的发展，对运动性疲劳和过度训练的监控与诊断已成为提高运动员竞技表现、防止损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析机体在运动状态下代谢产物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，在疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断方面具有显著贡献。《运动生物化学》深入研究了运动如何影响包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群在内的不同人群的生化标志物。特别是关于能量代谢和平衡的研究，为识别累积性疲劳和过度训练提供了新的见解。这些生化检测方法不仅提升了运动的科学性，也为运动员长期健康和高效训练提供了可靠的支持。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the development of sports science, the monitoring and diagnosis of sports fatigue and overtraining have become essential research areas for improving athletes' performance and preventing injuries. Sports biochemistry provides an important scientific basis for diagnosing fatigue and overtraining by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activities, and endocrine markers within the body during exercise. "Sports Biochemistry" examines in detail the biochemical effects of exercise on different groups, including track and field athletes, elderly people, children, and the general population. Particularly, research on energy metabolism and balance offers new insights for identifying cumulative fatigue and overtraining. These biochemical detection methods not only enhance the scientific basis of sports but also provide solid guarantees for athletes' long-term health and effective training.
EN_ZH: 随着体育科学的发展，对运动性疲劳和过度训练的监测与诊断已成为提高运动员表现和预防伤病的重要研究领域。运动生物化学通过分析机体在运动过程中的代谢产物、酶活性和内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的诊断提供了重要的科学依据。《运动生物化学》详细探讨了运动对不同群体（包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群）的生化影响，尤其是关于能量代谢和平衡的研究，为识别累积性疲劳和过度训练提供了新认识。这些生化检测方法不仅提升了体育运动的科学基础，而且为运动员长期健康和有效训练提供了坚实保障。

abstract: <正>随着体育运动科学的发展，运动疲劳与过度训练的监测和诊断成为提升运动员竞技表现与预防损伤的重要研究方向。运动生物化学通过分析运动过程中体内代谢物、酶活性及内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳和过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要依据。《运动生物化学》深入探讨了运动对不同人群，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童及普通人群等生物化学指标的影响，其中关于能量代谢与平衡的研究，为识别疲劳累积及过度训练提供了新思路。这种生物化学检测手段，不仅提升了体育运动的科学性，也为运动员的长期健康与高效训练提供了坚实保障。
ZH_EN: With the development of sports science, monitoring and diagnosis of exercise fatigue and overtraining have become important research areas for improving athletes' competitive performance and preventing injuries. Exercise biochemistry provides significant guidance for scientifically diagnosing fatigue and overtraining by analyzing changes in metabolites, enzyme activities, and endocrine indicators in the body during exercise. "Exercise Biochemistry" thoroughly discusses the biochemical effects of exercise on different populations, including track and field athletes, elderly individuals, children, and the general population. Among these, studies on energy metabolism and balance offer new insights into identifying accumulated fatigue and overtraining. These biochemical testing methods not only enhance the scientific approach to sports but also provide solid assurance for athletes' long-term health and effective training.
EN_ZH: 随着运动科学的发展，运动疲劳和过度训练的监测与诊断已成为提升运动员竞技表现和预防损伤的重要研究领域。运动生物化学通过分析机体在运动过程中代谢产物、酶活性和内分泌指标的变化，为疲劳与过度训练的科学诊断提供了重要指导。《运动生物化学》全面探讨了运动对不同人群的生化影响，包括田径运动员、老年人、儿童和普通人群。其中，有关能量代谢和平衡的研究为识别积累性疲劳和过度训练提供了新的思路。这些生化检测手段不仅提高了运动训练的科学性，也为运动员长期健康与有效训练提供了可靠保障。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: In June 2024, Zhejiang Province's chemistry elective examination will maintain stability in terms of exam format, assessed content, and selected materials, yet introduce moderate innovation through rotating test points, innovative presentations, and altered perspectives to reverse the tendency of standardized exam-setting and formulaic teaching approaches. Guided by the core concept of "structure determines properties," the exam will emphasize experimental assessment within realistic contexts, striving to enhance structural coherence of exam questions, and extract authentic questions capable of accurately diagnosing and fostering students' core competencies. Additionally, high school chemistry teaching suggestions suitable for competency-based elective exams will be proposed in terms of curriculum standards, textbooks, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考将在试卷结构、考查内容和素材选用上保持稳定，同时通过知识点轮换考查、情境创新呈现及视角转换等手段适度创新，以扭转命题固化和教学模式化的倾向。考试坚持“结构决定性质”的核心理念，突出实验能力在真实情境下的考查，着力提高试题的结构化水平，提炼真实情境题目，更精准地诊断并培养学生的核心素养。同时，将结合课程标准、教材和实验等方面，提出适用于素养导向选考的高中化学教学建议。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: The chemistry examination for Zhejiang Province in June 2024, while maintaining stability in test format, assessment content, and material selection, will incorporate moderate innovations through rotating test points, novel presentations, and changing perspectives, aiming to reverse tendencies of standardized question-setting and routine-oriented instruction. Based on the core concept that "structure determines properties," the exam will enhance experimental assessment through creating relevant real-world scenarios, striving to improve the structural design of questions, and extracting authentic problems capable of accurately diagnosing and cultivating students' core competencies. Additionally, suggestions for chemistry instruction at the high school level will be provided in alignment with competence-oriented elective examination practices from the perspectives of curriculum standards, teaching materials, and experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考在保持命题形式、考查内容与素材选取稳定性的基础上，将适度创新，通过考点轮换、情境创设与视角转换，力求扭转命题标准化、教学套路化的倾向。考试基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，以真实情境创设为载体，增强实验考查力度，着力优化试题结构设计，提炼真实问题情境，以精准诊断并培养学生的核心素养。此外，还将从课程标准、教材和实验等角度提出与素养导向选考实践相协调的高中化学教学建议。

abstract: 2024年6月浙江省化学选考试题在试卷形式、考查内容、素材选用等方面保持稳定的基础上,通过轮换考点、创新呈现、变更角度等方式适度创新,扭转命题“模式化”、教学“套路化”的倾向。基于“结构决定性质”核心观念,通过创设适切的真实情境,加大对实验考查的力度,着力提高试题的结构化水平,提炼能准确诊断和发展学生核心素养的真问题。同时从课标、教材、实验三个方面提出适应素养化选考的高中化学教学建议。
ZH_EN: In June 2024, Zhejiang Province's chemistry elective examination will maintain stability in examination formats, assessment content, and resource selection, while moderately innovating through rotating examination points, presenting new approaches, and shifting perspectives to reverse tendencies toward standardized question setting and routinized teaching methods. Based on the core idea that "structure determines properties," the exam emphasizes experimental assessments through the creation of appropriate real-world contexts, thereby enhancing the structured nature of exam questions and formulating authentic problems that effectively diagnose and develop students' core competencies. Additionally, teaching recommendations for chemistry at the high school level that align with competency-oriented elective exams are proposed based on curriculum standards, textbooks, and laboratory experiments.
EN_ZH: 2024年6月，浙江省化学选考将在试卷结构、考察内容及素材选取等方面保持稳定，同时适度创新，通过考点轮换、新情境创设及视角转变，扭转试题命制的模式化倾向以及教学方法的套路化倾向。考试基于“结构决定性质”的核心观念，通过创设合适的真实情境，强化实验考查，从而提升试题的结构性、真实性，形成可有效诊断并发展学生核心素养的真实问题。此外，还基于课程标准、教材及实验活动，提出了与素养导向选考相匹配的高中化学教学建议。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important avenue for disseminating scientific knowledge and enhancing citizens' scientific literacy. Focusing on three fundamental questions in introductory chemistry education at the junior high school level—why to read, what to read, and how to read—this paper discusses the significance of popular-science reading in junior high chemistry teaching, proposes criteria for selecting chemistry reading books appropriate for junior high students, and recommends several classic popular-science works. Based on actual classroom and extracurricular teaching practice, it elaborates on methods to guide junior high school students' chemistry reading, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library plus chemistry reading" model, integration of both classroom and extracurricular activities, and multi-disciplinary collaboration, to effectively enhance students' chemical literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是传播科学知识和提升公民科学素养的重要途径。本文围绕初中化学入门教育中的三个基本问题——为什么读、读什么和怎么读，探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的意义，提出了适合初中生阅读的化学类书籍选择标准，并推荐了一些经典的科普读物。同时，基于课堂内外教学实践，详细阐述了指导初中学生进行化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课堂内外活动的融合以及跨学科合作，以有效提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Science popularization reading is an important way to disseminate scientific knowledge and improve citizens' scientific literacy. Centering on three basic questions—why read, what to read, and how to read—during the introductory stage of junior high school chemistry education, this paper discusses the significance of science popularization reading in junior high school chemistry teaching, outlines criteria for selecting appropriate chemistry reading materials for junior high school students, and recommends several classic popular science works. By combining classroom teaching and extracurricular activities, it elaborates methods to guide junior high school students' chemical reading, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library plus chemistry reading" model, integration of classroom and extracurricular learning, and multidisciplinary collaboration, in order to enhance students' chemical literacy.
EN_ZH: 科学普及阅读是传播科学知识、提高公民科学素养的重要途径。本文以初中化学教育入门阶段“为什么读”“读什么”和“怎么读”三个基本问题为核心，探讨了科普阅读在初中化学教学中的重要意义，提出了适合初中生化学阅读材料的选择标准，并推荐了几部经典的化学科普作品。同时，通过课堂教学与课外活动相结合的方式，阐述了指导初中生进行化学阅读的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与汇报、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外一体化推进以及跨学科合作等，以提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: 科普阅读是普及科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学启蒙教育阶段化学科普阅读为什么读、读什么和怎么读三个基本问题，探讨了初中化学教学中科普阅读的意义，提出了初中化学阅读书籍选择的标准，并推荐了一些经典科普著作作为参考读物。结合课内外教学实际，阐述引导初中生开展化学阅读的方法，包括思辨性阅读与表达、探究性阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课内外结合、多学科联动等，以提高学生的化学素养。
ZH_EN: Popular science reading is an important means of disseminating scientific knowledge and enhancing citizens' scientific literacy. Focusing on the three fundamental questions during introductory chemistry education at junior high school level—why read, what to read, and how to read chemistry-related popular science materials—this discussion examines the significance of incorporating popular science reading into junior high chemistry teaching, proposes standards for selecting appropriate chemistry reading materials for junior high students, and recommends several classic science popularization works as references. Combining in-class and extracurricular teaching realities, it explains methods to guide junior high students in conducting chemistry reading activities, including critical reading and expression, inquiry-based reading and presentation, the "library + chemistry reading" model, integrating classroom learning with extracurricular activities, and interdisciplinary cooperation, to improve students' chemical literacy.
EN_ZH: 科普阅读是传播科学知识、提升公民科学素养的重要途径。围绕初中化学入门阶段中“为什么读、读什么、如何读”这三个基本问题，探讨了将化学类科普阅读纳入初中化学教学的意义，提出了适合初中生的化学阅读材料选择标准，并推荐了一些经典科普作品作为参考。同时结合课内外教学实际，阐述了指导初中生开展化学阅读活动的方法，包括批判性阅读与表达、探究式阅读与展示、“图书馆+化学阅读”模式、课堂教学与课外活动相结合及跨学科合作等，以提高学生的化学素养。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a form of activity that enhances physical fitness and improves health, intersects and integrates with chemistry, a branch of natural science, in numerous ways. Chemical theories play an irreplaceable role in guiding sports education and training, especially in athlete nutrition supplementation, sports equipment improvement, and anti-doping detection. From the perspective of athlete nutrition supplementation, chemical theories reveal to us the composition of various nutrients in food and the mechanisms behind energy conversion. Athletes engaging in high-intensity exercise need to consume large amounts of energy, and a reasonable nutritional supply ensures they maintain optimal conditions in both training and competitions.
EN_ZH: 体育运动作为一种增强体能、增进健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在许多方面相互交织与融合。化学理论在指导体育教育与训练中发挥着不可替代的作用，尤其是在运动员营养补充、体育装备改进和反兴奋剂检测方面。从运动员营养补充的角度来看，化学理论向我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的组成以及能量转化背后的机制。进行高强度运动的运动员需要消耗大量能量，合理的营养供应可以确保他们在训练和比赛中保持最佳状态。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: As a form of activity that improves physical fitness and enhances health, sports intersect and integrate at multiple levels with chemistry, a field of natural sciences. Chemical theories play an irreplaceable role in guiding sports teaching and training, particularly in aspects such as athletes' nutritional supplementation, improvement of sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. Regarding athletes' nutritional supplementation, chemical theories reveal the composition and energy conversion mechanisms of various nutrients in food. Athletes undergoing high-intensity exercise consume substantial amounts of energy, and a proper nutritional regimen can ensure they maintain optimal condition during training and competitions.
EN_ZH: 体育作为一种增强身体素质、促进健康的活动形式，与自然科学领域的化学在多个层面存在交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教学和训练中发挥着不可替代的作用，尤其是在运动员营养补充、运动器材改进和反兴奋剂检测等方面。在运动员营养补充方面，化学理论揭示了食物中各种营养成分的组成及能量转化机制。处于高强度运动状态下的运动员消耗大量能量，合理的营养方案能确保他们在训练和比赛期间保持最佳状态。

abstract: <正>体育作为一种提升身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，与化学这一自然科学领域在多个层面上存在着交叉与融合。化学理论在指导体育教导及训练过程中，尤其是在运动员的营养补给、运动器材的改进以及反兴奋剂检测等方面，均展现出不可替代的作用。从运动员的营养补给来看，化学理论为我们揭示了食物中各种营养成分的构成与能量转换机制。运动员在高强度的运动过程中，需要消耗大量的能量，而合理的营养补给能够确保运动员在训练及比赛中保持最佳状态。
ZH_EN: Sports, as a form of activity that improves physical fitness and enhances health, intersects and integrates with the natural scientific field of chemistry on multiple levels. Chemical theories exhibit indispensable roles in guiding athletic instruction and training, especially in areas such as athlete nutritional supplementation, improvements in sports equipment, and anti-doping testing. Regarding athlete nutrition supplementation, chemical theory helps clarify the composition of various nutrients within foods and their energy conversion mechanisms. During intense physical exercise, athletes expend a significant amount of energy, and proper nutritional supplementation ensures that athletes maintain optimal performance during training and competition.
EN_ZH: 体育作为一种提高身体素质、增强健康的活动形式，在多个层面上与化学这一自然科学领域相互交叉并融合。化学理论在指导体育教学与训练方面发挥着不可或缺的作用，尤其是在运动员营养补充、运动装备改进及反兴奋剂检测等领域。在运动员营养补充方面，化学理论有助于清晰阐明食物中各种营养物质的组成及其能量转化机制。在剧烈的体育运动过程中，运动员消耗大量能量，适当的营养补充能确保运动员在训练和比赛期间维持最佳状态。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Based on an evaluation and analysis of previous studies using photometry and turbidity methods to investigate the effect of concentration and temperature on chemical reaction rates through the reaction between sodium thiosulfate and sulfuric acid, an experimental device was designed and assembled using readily available materials such as a laser pointer, silicon photovoltaic sensor, Bluetooth data acquisition module, and smartphone, guided by STEM concepts and students' prior understanding of the Tyndall effect. Using this device, voltage signals from the silicon photovoltaic sensor during reactions under various conditions were collected and quantitatively analyzed. The conclusions regarding the impact of reactant concentration and temperature on reaction rates are consistent with values reported in literature. Through this process, students vividly experienced the practical value of theoretical knowledge, enjoyed the process of learning chemistry, and significantly improved their experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于对以往采用光度法和浊度法研究硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应，探讨浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的研究文献的评价与分析，以STEM理念和学生对丁达尔效应的已有理解为指导，利用激光笔、硅光伏传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块和智能手机等易于获取的材料设计并组装了一套实验装置。通过这一装置，定量收集并分析了硅光伏传感器在不同条件下反应过程中产生的电压信号。所得结论与文献报道的浓度和温度对于反应速率影响的数据相一致。在此过程中，学生直观地感受到了理论知识的实际应用价值，充分体验了化学学习的乐趣，并显著提高了自己的实验技能和解决问题的能力。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Based on analysis of previous studies using photometric and turbidimetric methods to investigate the effects of concentration and temperature on reaction rates involving the reaction between sodium thiosulfate and sulfuric acid, an experimental setup was designed and assembled according to STEM concepts. Utilizing easily accessible equipment such as laser pointers, silicon photovoltaic sensors, Bluetooth-enabled data acquisition modules, and smartphones, and applying the principle of the Tyndall effect, which students had already mastered, the device was used to collect and quantitatively analyze voltage signals generated by the silicon photovoltaic sensors under varying reaction conditions. Results obtained regarding the influence of reactant concentration and temperature on reaction rates were consistent with literature values. Throughout this process, students strongly experienced the practical application value of theoretical knowledge, enjoyed the pleasure of learning chemistry, and effectively enhanced their experimental hands-on skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于对以往文献中使用光度法和浊度法研究硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应速率受浓度和温度影响的分析，依据STEM理念设计并搭建了实验装置。实验利用激光笔、硅光伏传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块和智能手机等易获取设备，应用学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，在不同反应条件下采集和定量分析了硅光伏传感器产生的电压信号。所得关于反应物浓度和温度对反应速率影响的结果与文献值相符。在此过程中，学生切实体会了理论知识的实际应用价值，感受到学习化学的乐趣，并有效提升了实验动手能力及解决问题的能力。

abstract: 在评析前人采用光度法和浊度法，以硫代硫酸钠与硫酸反应探究浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的工作基础上，基于STEM理念，依据学生已掌握的丁达尔效应原理，利用简单易得的激光头、硅光电池传感器、数据采集蓝牙模块以及智能手机等实验器材，设计、组装了实验装置。应用装置对不同条件下反应过程中硅光电池传感器输出的电压信号进行数据收集和定量分析，得到反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率影响的结论与文献中数值一致。在此过程中，学生能强烈感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验学习化学的乐趣，同时有效提高实验动手能力和问题解决能力。
ZH_EN: Based on analyzing previous work that used photometry and turbidity methods to explore how concentration and temperature affect the chemical reaction rate between sodium thiosulfate and sulfuric acid, we designed and assembled an experimental device guided by STEM concepts, using simple and readily available experimental components such as laser pointers, silicon photocell sensors, data acquisition Bluetooth modules, and smartphones, based on the students' existing knowledge of the Tyndall effect principle. With this device, voltage signals from silicon photocell sensors under varying reaction conditions were collected and quantitatively analyzed, resulting in conclusions about the influence of reactant concentrations and temperatures on chemical reaction rates that align with literature values. Through this process, students strongly feel the practical utility of theoretical knowledge, experience the enjoyment of learning chemistry, and effectively enhance their hands-on experimental skills and problem-solving abilities.
EN_ZH: 基于对以往使用光度法和浊度法研究浓度与温度对硫代硫酸钠和硫酸之间化学反应速率影响的工作的分析，我们以STEM理念为指导，以学生已有的丁达尔效应原理知识为基础，设计并组装了实验装置。该装置利用激光笔、硅光电池传感器、蓝牙数据采集模块和智能手机等简单易得的实验部件，实现了不同反应条件下硅光电池传感器电压信号的采集和定量分析，得出反应物浓度和温度对化学反应速率的影响与文献数值相符的结论。通过此过程，学生深刻感受到理论知识的实际应用价值，体验到学习化学的乐趣，有效提升了动手实验能力以及解决问题的能力。

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
EN_ZH:
元素观：物质由元素组成；元素可分为不同类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素的性质相似；物质的性质取决于其元素组成，可依据元素组成对物质进行分类；在化学反应中元素种类保持不变。

分类观：选择分类对象和分类标准（特征），对元素进行分类，对物质进行分类，对变化进行分类，对化学反应进行分类，对反应条件进行分类，对物质性质进行分类，对物质结构进行分类，对实验探究中的影响因素进行分类，对实验原理、仪器及操作进行分类。

微粒观：物质由微观粒子构成；

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
ZH_EN:
Elemental Viewpoint: Substances are composed of elements; elements can be divided into different categories, and different elements have different properties, while elements of the same type have similar properties. The properties of substances are related to their elemental composition, allowing substances to be classified according to their elemental composition. The types of elements remain unchanged before and after chemical reactions.

Classification Viewpoint: Choosing objects to classify and perspectives (characteristics) used for classification; classification of elements, substances, changes, chemical reactions, conditions of chemical reactions, properties of substances, structures of substances, dependent and independent variables in experimental studies, experimental principles, experimental apparatus, and experimental procedures.

Particle Viewpoint: Matter is composed of microscopic particles.
EN_ZH:
元素观：物质由元素组成，元素可以划分为不同种类，不同元素具有不同的性质，而同种元素的性质相似。物质的性质与其元素组成有关，因此可根据元素组成对物质进行分类。化学反应前后元素种类不变。

分类观：选择分类的对象以及用于分类的角度（特征）；对元素、物质、变化、化学反应、反应条件、物质性质、物质结构、实验研究中的自变量与因变量、实验原理、实验装置和实验步骤等进行分类。

粒子观：物质由微观粒子构成。

abstract: <正>元素观：物质是由元素组成的；元素可以分为不同的类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，同类元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与元素组成有关，可以按照元素组成来分类物质；化学反应前后元素的种类不变……分类观：选择分类的对象及分类的视角(特征),元素的分类，物质的分类，变化的分类，化学反应的分类，化学反应条件的分类，物质性质的分类，物质结构的分类，实验探究中影响变量的分类，实验原理、实验仪器、实验操作的分类……微粒观：物质是由微观粒子构成的；
EN_ZH:
元素观：物质由元素组成；元素可以划分为不同类别，不同元素具有不同的性质，相似元素具有相似的性质；物质的性质与其元素组成相关，可以根据元素组成分类物质；元素的种类在化学反应前后保持不变……

分类观：选择分类的对象与角度（特征）；元素的分类、物质的分类、变化的分类、化学反应的分类、反应条件的分类、物质性质的分类、物质结构的分类、影响实验探究的变量分类、实验原理、仪器与操作的分类……

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education refers to education in aesthetics, moral sentiment, and spiritual growth, and also serves to enrich imagination and foster innovative awareness. Chemistry is a natural science that explores the structure, properties, and transformation laws of substances, playing a key role in advancing fields such as new materials, new energy, modern agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic education elements into the teaching practice of basic chemistry courses can not only stimulate students' interest in chemistry, promote the inheritance and confidence in outstanding traditional Chinese culture, and strengthen students' patriotism, but it also constitutes an important pathway for achieving the fundamental educational goal of cultivating virtue and nurturing comprehensive, high-quality talents. This educational model helps develop well-rounded individuals who balance sensitivity and flexibility with rational rigor. However, at present, incorporating aesthetic education into basic chemistry course teaching in universities is still at an initial exploratory stage. To effectively facilitate the integration of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: first, teachers should emphasize logical beauty when organizing curriculum content, taking into consideration not only the internal logical structure of the curriculum and students’ physical and mental development rules, but also students' interests, needs, and experiential backgrounds, thereby ensuring unity between the logical curriculum sequencing and students’ psychological development and providing students with a positive learning experience. Second, aesthetic contexts should be created through carefully designed and concise integration of PPT presentations, blackboard notes, and teaching language, thus constructing artistic beauty in classroom teaching. Third, aesthetic education teaching should be innovated by adopting varied instructional methods like BOPPPS to facilitate integrated beauty between chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, aesthetic education theories should be refined and incorporated into basic chemistry textbooks, promoting high-quality development of chemistry teaching materials. These measures provide references for gradually establishing an aesthetic education theoretical system within chemistry courses, as well as for promoting and deepening the implementation of aesthetic education in chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH:
美育是指对审美、道德情操和精神成长方面的教育，有助于丰富想象力、培养创新意识。化学是一门研究物质的组成、性质以及变化规律的自然科学，在新材料、新能源、现代农业、信息技术等领域的发展中具有关键作用。在基础化学课程教学实践中融入美育元素，不仅能够激发学生对化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与文化自信，增强学生的爱国情怀，也是一条实现立德树人根本任务、培养德智体美劳全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵活与理性严谨兼备的全面型人才。然而，目前高校在基础化学课程教学中融入美育元素仍处于初步探索阶段。

为了更好地推进美育与化学教学的融合，建议采取如下措施：第一，教师在组织课程内容时，要着力突出逻辑美，既要考虑课程内部的逻辑结构和学生的身心发展规律，又要考虑学生的兴趣需求与经验背景，使课程的逻辑顺序和学生心理发展规律有机统一，为学生提供积极的学习体验。第二，通过精心设计简洁融合的PPT课件、板书及教学语言创造审美情境，在课堂教学中体现艺术美。第三，创新美育教学，通过采用BOPPPS等多样化教学法，实现化学教育与美育的融合之美。第四，完善美育理论，并融入到基础化学教材建设当中，推进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论体系及推动和深化美育在化学教学中的实施提供了参考借鉴。

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education is education in appreciating beauty, cultivating character, nurturing the soul, as well as enriching imagination and fostering innovative awareness. Chemistry is a natural science that explores the structures, properties and transformation laws of matter, playing a key role in driving advancements in fields such as new materials, new energy, modern agriculture, and informatization. Integrating aesthetic education into the basic chemistry course teaching practice helps not only stimulate students' interest in chemistry, facilitate the transmission and confidence in outstanding Chinese traditional culture, and strengthen students' patriotic feelings, but also serves as an essential approach to fulfilling the fundamental mission of moral education and developing well-rounded and high-quality talents. This educational model fosters talent with balanced development in both perceptual agility and rational rigor. However, currently, universities are still in the preliminary exploratory stages of implementing aesthetic education in basic chemistry courses. To effectively promote the integration between aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: Firstly, when designing curriculum content, teachers should emphasize the beauty of logical order, adhering not only to the discipline's inherent logical sequence and students' physical and psychological development patterns, but also comprehensively considering students' interests, needs, backgrounds and experiences, ensuring alignment between logical sequencing and students' psychological development, thereby achieving a positive learning experience. Secondly, create an aesthetic educational environment carefully by designing and refining PowerPoints, blackboard notes and classroom language in an integrated artistic manner. Thirdly, innovate methods of aesthetic teaching, implementing teaching approaches such as BOPPPS, thus realizing the aesthetic fusion between chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourthly, refine aesthetic education theory to incorporate into basic chemistry textbooks, promoting high-quality development of chemistry teaching materials. These measures offer guidance in gradually constructing an aesthetic educational theoretical framework within chemistry education, and in promoting and deepening the practice of aesthetic education in teaching chemistry courses.
EN_ZH: 美育是培养审美能力、陶冶情操、涵养心灵，丰富想象力并促进创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构、性质及转化规律的自然科学，在新材料、新能源、现代农业和信息化等领域的发展中发挥着关键作用。将美育融入基础化学课程教学实践，不仅有助于激发学生对化学的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，增强学生的爱国情感，更是落实立德树人根本任务、培养全面高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式培养了感性灵动与理性严谨均衡发展的优秀人才。但目前高校在基础化学课程美育实施上仍处于初步探索阶段。为有效推动美育与化学教学的融合，特提出以下措施：一是在课程内容设计上突出逻辑秩序之美，既遵循学科自身逻辑规律及学生身心发展规律，又全面考虑学生的兴趣需求、背景经验，实现逻辑序列与心理发展的有机统一，达到良好的学习体验；二是精心创设美育教育环境，对课件（PPT）、板书、课堂语言实施整体艺术化设计与优化；三是创新美育教学方法，实施诸如BOPPPS教学法等教学手段，实现化学教育与美育的审美融合；四是提炼美育理论，为纳入基础化学教材做好铺垫，推动化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施有助于逐步构建化学教学中的美育理论框架，引领促进并深化化学课程教育教学中的美育实践。

abstract: 美育是审美教育、情操教育、心灵教育，也是丰富想象力和培养创新意识的教育。化学是一门探究物质结构性质和变化规律的自然科学，对推动新材料、新能源、新农业以及信息化等领域的发展具有关键作用。将美育元素融入化学基础课程教学实践中，不仅能够激发学生对化学学科的兴趣，促进中华优秀传统文化的传承与自信，强化学生的爱国情感，而且是实现立德树人根本任务、培育全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式有助于培养感性灵动与理性严谨并举的全面发展型人才。然而，当前高校在化学基础课程教学中实施美育仍处于初步探索阶段，为有效促进美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是教师在组织课程教学内容时，要注重内容的逻辑美，不仅要基于课程固有的逻辑顺序，遵循学生的身心发展规律，还应综合考虑学生的兴趣、需求、经验背景等，以确保课程内容的逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展相统一，使学生拥有良好的学习体验；二是创设美育情境，将PPT、板书和授课语言精心设计、凝炼和融合，打造课堂教学的艺术美；三是创新美育教学，采用BOPPPS等教学方法等，实现化学教育与美育的融合美；四是凝练美育理论，融入化学基础课教材，促进化学教材的高质量发展。这些措施为逐步构建化学课程中的美育理论体系，推广与深化美育在化学课程教学中的应用提供了参考。
ZH_EN: Aesthetic education refers to education in aesthetics, sentiment, and spirituality, as well as education aimed at enriching imagination and fostering innovation awareness. Chemistry, as a natural science exploring the structure, properties, and transformations of matter, plays a crucial role in promoting advancements in fields such as new materials, new energy, modern agriculture, and information technology. Integrating aesthetic education elements into foundational chemistry courses not only stimulates students' interest in chemistry, promotes the inheritance and confidence in outstanding traditional Chinese culture, and reinforces their patriotic sentiments, but also represents a significant pathway for achieving the fundamental task of morality cultivation and nurturing comprehensively developed, high-quality talent. This educational model helps cultivate individuals who balance emotional sensitivity and rational rigor, thereby becoming comprehensively developed talents. However, the current integration of aesthetic education into foundational chemistry courses at universities is still in its preliminary exploratory stage. To effectively promote the fusion of aesthetic education and chemistry teaching, the following measures are proposed: First, when structuring the course content, teachers should emphasize logical beauty, adhering not only to the inherent logical sequence of the curriculum and the laws governing students' psychological development but also comprehensively considering students' interests, needs, and experiential backgrounds, ensuring the logical sequence aligns with students' psychological progression and provides an optimal learning experience. Second, aesthetic contexts should be created by meticulously designing, refining, and integrating PPT presentations, blackboard layouts, and instructional language to establish artistic beauty in classroom teaching. Third, innovative aesthetic teaching methods such as the BOPPPS model should be adopted to realize a harmonious integration of chemistry education and aesthetic education. Fourth, aesthetic education concepts should be condensed and systematically incorporated into foundational chemistry textbooks, thereby promoting high-quality textbook development. These measures provide a useful reference for gradually constructing the theoretical system of aesthetic education in chemistry courses and for extending and deepening the application of aesthetic education within chemistry teaching.
EN_ZH: 美育是关于审美、情感和精神层面的教育，也是丰富学生想象力、培养创新意识的教育。化学作为一门探索物质结构、性质及其变化规律的自然科学，对于推动新材料、新能源、现代农业和信息技术等领域的发展起着至关重要的作用。在大学基础化学课程中融入美育元素，不仅能激发学生对化学的兴趣，促进对中华优秀传统文化的传承与文化自信，增强爱国情感，更是落实立德树人根本任务、培养全面发展的高素质人才的重要途径。这种教育模式能够培养学生感性敏锐和理性严谨协调统一，从而成长为综合素质全面的人才。目前，大学基础化学课程中美育的融合还处于初步探索阶段。为有效推动美育与化学教学的融合，提出以下措施：一是课程内容建构要注重逻辑美，既尊重课程知识内容的内在逻辑与学生心理发展规律，也全面考虑学生兴趣需求与经验背景，使其逻辑顺序与学生的心理发展规律相协调，从而提供最佳的学习体验。二是通过精心设计、优化整合教学PPT、板书和教学语言，营造审美情境，打造课堂教学中的艺术美。三是引入BOPPPS等创新美育教学模式，促进化学教育和美育的和谐统一。四是提炼凝练美育理念并系统融入基础化学教材，推动高质量教材建设。上述措施为逐步构建化学课程美育理论体系，以及拓展和深化美育在化学教学中的应用提供了有益参考。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an essential part of the chemistry discipline, integrating physical and mathematical theories and methods to reveal the fundamental laws of chemical changes, thus forming the core content of chemistry. It not only plays a crucial role in promoting scientific and technological progress but also significantly influences socio-economic development. At present, physical chemistry continuously deepens its interdisciplinary integration with physics, biology, food science, agriculture, medicine, and other related fields, broadening the scope of its application. This paper analyzes issues arising in physical chemistry teaching and proposes corresponding coping strategies.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学学科的重要组成部分，它融合物理学与数学的理论方法，揭示化学变化的基本规律，从而构成化学的核心内容。它不仅对推动科技进步具有关键作用，也对社会经济发展产生重大影响。目前，物理化学正持续加深与物理、生物、食品科学、农业、医学等相关领域的交叉融合，拓宽了其应用范围。本文分析了物理化学教学中存在的问题，并提出了相应的应对策略。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important branch of chemistry, combining physics and mathematical theories and methods to reveal the fundamental laws governing chemical changes, making it core content within chemical sciences. It plays a significant role not only in promoting scientific and technological advancement but also in contributing substantially to socio-economic development. Currently, the ongoing integration and interdisciplinary collaboration of physical chemistry with physics, biology, food science, agriculture, medicine, and other fields have significantly expanded its scope of application. This article analyzes some issues encountered in physical chemistry education and proposes corresponding strategies to address them.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学的一门重要分支，它结合物理学和数学理论及方法，揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学科学中的核心内容。它不仅在推动科技进步方面发挥重要作用，而且在促进社会经济发展中也做出了重要贡献。目前，物理化学正与物理学、生物学、食品科学、农业、医学等多个领域持续融合和交叉协作，使其应用范围得到显著拓展。本文分析了当前物理化学教学中存在的一些问题，并提出了解决这些问题的相应对策。

abstract: 物理化学是化学学科的一个重要组成部分，它是一门将物理、数学理论和方法相结合的学科，旨在揭示化学变化的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科技进步起着重要的推动作用，而且对社会经济的发展也有着举足轻重的作用。现阶段物理化学与物理、生物、食品、农医等学科的交叉和融合不断深化，拓宽了学科的应用范围。文章对物理化学教学中出现的一些问题进行了分析，并提出了相应的应对策略。
ZH_EN: Physical chemistry is an important branch of chemistry. It integrates theories and methods from physics and mathematics, aiming to uncover the fundamental principles underlying chemical transformations, and constitutes the core content of chemistry as a discipline. It not only plays a critical role in advancing science and technology, but also significantly contributes to socioeconomic development. At present, the deepening interdisciplinary integration of physical chemistry with fields such as physics, biology, food science, agriculture, and medicine has broadened its scope of application. This article analyzes some issues arising in the teaching of physical chemistry and proposes corresponding strategies to address them.
EN_ZH: 物理化学是化学的一个重要分支，它融合了物理学和数学的理论与方法，旨在揭示化学变化背后的基本规律，是化学学科的核心内容。它不仅对科学技术的进步发挥着关键作用，而且对社会经济发展具有重要意义。目前，物理化学与物理、生物、食品科学、农业及医学等领域的交叉融合不断深入，其应用范围日益拓宽。本文分析了物理化学教学中存在的一些问题，并提出了相应的解决对策。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: Chemistry of Life, founded in 1980, is a comprehensive biological academic journal sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology and openly published domestically and internationally. It is recognized as a core journal of Chinese science and technology and has been indexed by national and international databases, including Chemical Abstracts (CA) of the USA, Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Papers and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China Journal Network. It was selected as an Excellent Journal by the China Association for Science and Technology in 2015. The journal includes sections such as research papers, reviews, education, research frontiers, techniques and methodologies, and biochemical studies in traditional Chinese medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办，是国内外公开发行的综合性生物学学术期刊。该刊被评为中国科技核心期刊，并被国内外多个数据库收录，包括美国《化学文摘》(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)及中国期刊网。2015年，该刊被中国科学技术协会评为“优秀期刊”。该期刊设有研究论文、综述、教学园地、研究前沿、技术与方法及中医药生物化学研究等栏目。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: Chemistry of Life was founded in 1980. Sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology, it is a multidisciplinary academic journal in biology published openly both domestically and internationally. It is a Chinese core science and technology journal indexed by domestic and international databases including Chemical Abstracts (CA, USA), Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China Journal Network. It was selected by the China Association for Science and Technology as a high-quality journal in 2015. The columns include research articles, reviews, education, research frontiers, technologies and methods, and biochemistry in traditional Chinese medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办，是一本面向国内外公开发行的多学科生物学术期刊。本刊为中国科技核心期刊，被美国《化学文摘》（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科技论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）和中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录，2015年被中国科学技术协会评选为精品科技期刊。期刊栏目包括研究论文、综述、教学研究、研究前沿、技术与方法以及中医药生物化学等。

abstract: <正>《生命的化学》创刊于1980年,为中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办,面向国内外公开发行的生物综合类学术期刊。中国科技核心期刊,已被美国化学文摘(CA)、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库(JST)、中国科技论文与引文数据库(CSTPCD)、中国生物学文摘数据库(CBA)、中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年入选中国科协精品期刊。设有研究论文、综述、教学、研究前沿、技术与方法、中医药生化等栏目。
ZH_EN: Chemistry of Life, founded in 1980, is a comprehensive biological academic journal sponsored by the Chinese Society of Biochemistry and Molecular Biology and openly distributed both domestically and internationally. It is recognized as a core Chinese science and technology journal and has been indexed by domestic and international databases such as Chemical Abstracts (CA) from the United States, Japan Science and Technology Agency Database (JST), Chinese Science and Technology Paper and Citation Database (CSTPCD), Chinese Biological Abstracts Database (CBA), and China Journal Net. In 2015, it was selected as a Best-quality Journal by the China Association for Science and Technology. The journal includes sections for Research Articles, Reviews, Teaching, Research Frontiers, Techniques and Methods, and Biochemistry of Traditional Chinese Medicine.
EN_ZH: 《生命的化学》创刊于1980年，是由中国生物化学与分子生物学会主办、国内外公开发行的综合性生物学学术期刊。该刊被认定为中国科技核心期刊，并已被美国《化学文摘》（CA）、日本科学技术振兴机构数据库（JST）、中国科技论文与引文数据库（CSTPCD）、中国生物学文摘数据库（CBA）和中国期刊网等国内外数据库收录。2015年，该刊入选中国科协精品科技期刊。期刊设有研究论文、综述、教学园地、研究前沿、技术与方法和中医药生物化学等栏目。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. Through statistical analysis, Piper diagrams, and Gibbs diagrams, the chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province, were analyzed. Simultaneously, groundwater quality was evaluated using single-factor evaluation and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation methods. The results indicate that groundwater in the study area is slightly alkaline and its hydrochemical types are diverse. The shallow groundwater quality in the study area is generally poor, mainly classified as categories V and IV. The water quality is primarily influenced by evaporation-concentration effects, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中发挥着非常重要的作用。本研究通过统计分析、Piper三线图和Gibbs图对河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征进行了分析。同时采用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对地下水水质进行了评价。结果表明，研究区地下水呈弱碱性，水化学类型多样；研究区浅层地下水水质总体较差，主要属于Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水质；其水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放及农业活动的影响。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. The chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province were analyzed using mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagrams, and Gibbs diagrams. Meanwhile, the groundwater quality was evaluated by single-factor evaluation and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation methods. The results showed that the groundwater in the study area is slightly alkaline with diverse groundwater chemical types. The overall shallow groundwater quality in the study area is relatively poor, mainly classified as Category V and Category IV water. Groundwater quality in the study area is primarily affected by evaporation-concentration processes, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中发挥着非常重要的作用。运用数理统计、Piper三线图和Gibbs图等方法，对河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征进行了分析；同时，通过单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对地下水水质进行了评价。结果表明，研究区地下水整体呈弱碱性，化学类型多样。研究区浅层地下水整体水质较差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水质。研究区地下水水质主要受到蒸发浓缩过程、生活污水排放及农业活动的影响。

abstract: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。利用数理统计、Piper三线图法和Gibbs图解法对河北省任丘市浅层地下水化学特征进行了分析，同时运用单因子评价法和模糊综合评价法对浅层地下水质进行了评价，结果表明：研究区地下水偏弱碱性，地下水化学类型多样;研究区浅层地下水质整体偏差，主要为Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水；研究区水质主要受蒸发浓缩作用、生活污水排放和农业活动的影响。
ZH_EN: Groundwater plays a very important role in the ecological environment. Mathematical statistics, Piper trilinear diagrams, and Gibbs diagrams were used to analyze the chemical characteristics of shallow groundwater in Renqiu City, Hebei Province. Single-factor evaluation and fuzzy comprehensive evaluation methods were applied to assess shallow groundwater quality. The results indicate that groundwater in the study area tends to be weakly alkaline and exhibits diverse chemical types. Generally, the shallow groundwater quality in the study area is poor, mostly categorized as Class V and Class IV. Groundwater quality in the study area is mainly influenced by evaporation concentration, domestic sewage discharge, and agricultural activities.
EN_ZH: 地下水在生态环境中起着非常重要的作用。本研究采用数理统计、Piper三线图和Gibbs图对河北省任丘市浅层地下水的化学特征进行了分析，并应用单因子评价和模糊综合评价方法对浅层地下水质量进行了评估。结果表明，研究区地下水整体呈弱碱性，化学类型多样。总体来说，研究区浅层地下水质量较差，多数属于Ⅴ类和Ⅳ类水质。研究区地下水质量主要受蒸发浓缩、生活污水排放以及农业活动等因素的影响。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: Chemical reagents in university laboratories are characterized by large storage quantities, high usage volumes, diverse types, complex physical and chemical properties, and significant hazard risks, posing higher demands on laboratory chemical safety management. Combining practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes common issues existing in traditional laboratory chemical management systems and actively explores solutions to these problems by applying information technology in areas such as personnel training, process management, and hardware facilities, providing new insights into the informatization and intelligent management of laboratory chemicals.
EN_ZH: 高校实验室化学试剂具有存储量大、使用量多、种类繁杂、理化性质复杂、危险性高等特点，对实验室化学品安全管理提出了更高要求。本文结合实验室管理的实际经验，总结了传统实验室化学品管理中存在的常见问题，并积极探索通过信息技术在人员培训、流程管理及硬件设施等方面的应用来解决这些问题，为实验室化学品管理的信息化、智能化提供了新思路。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: Laboratory chemical reagents in universities are characterized by large storage volumes, high usage amounts, diversity in types, complex physicochemical properties, and significant hazards, placing higher demands on safety management. Based on practical experience in laboratory management, this paper summarizes common problems in traditional chemical reagent management modes, actively explores the application of information technology to address these problems from aspects such as personnel training, process management, and infrastructure, and provides new ideas for informatization and intelligentization in laboratory chemical reagent management.
EN_ZH: 高校实验室化学试剂具有存储量大、使用量多、种类多样、理化性质复杂、危险性高等特点，对其安全管理提出了更高的要求。本文基于实验室管理的实践经验，总结了传统化学试剂管理模式中存在的常见问题，并积极探索信息化技术在人员培训、流程管理、基础设施等方面的应用，以解决这些问题，为实验室化学试剂管理的信息化、智能化提供新思路。

abstract: 高校实验室化学药品具有存储量大、使用量大、种类繁多、理化性质复杂和危险性大等特点，为实验室化学药品安全管理提出了更高的要求。结合实验室管理中的实践经验，总结了传统实验室化学药品管理模式下普遍存在的问题，并对应用信息技术从人员培训、过程管理和硬件设施等方面解决相应问题进行了积极的探索，为实验室化学药品管理信息化和智能化提供了新的思路。
ZH_EN: Chemical substances in university laboratories are characterized by large storage volumes, high usage, diverse types, complex physicochemical properties, and significant hazards, posing greater demands for laboratory chemical safety management. With practical experience in laboratory management, common issues in traditional laboratory chemical management modes are summarized, and proactive exploration through information technologies has been conducted in areas such as personnel training, process management, and infrastructure, offering new insights into the informatization and intelligentization of laboratory chemical management.
EN_ZH: 高校实验室化学品具有储存量大、使用频繁、种类繁多、理化性质复杂及危险性高等特点，对实验室化学品安全管理提出了更高要求。结合实验室管理实践经验，归纳总结了传统实验室化学品管理模式中存在的常见问题，并从人员培训、流程管控、基础设施等方面，积极探索信息化技术应用，为实验室化学品管理的信息化与智能化提供了新思路。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance innovation and interdisciplinary connection in organic chemistry experiment teaching, the educational significance of utilizing polymeric reagents in organic laboratory experiments was explored through two experiments: Williamson ether synthesis and Claisen rearrangement using phenolic resin as the substrate, and glucose acetate synthesis catalyzed by strongly acidic sulfonated polystyrene cation-exchange resin. The results indicated that introducing polymers as reagents in organic chemistry experiments could improve students' ability to apply integrative knowledge of organic and polymer chemistry, while also promoting students’ understanding and implementation of reaction atom economy and green chemistry concepts in the design of organic reaction pathways and optimization of synthetic processes.
EN_ZH: 为了提高有机化学实验教学的创新性和跨学科联系，通过两个实验探讨了聚合物试剂在有机实验教学中的教育意义：以酚醛树脂为底物的Williamson醚合成和Claisen重排反应，以及强酸性磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂催化的葡萄糖乙酸酯合成。结果表明，在有机化学实验中引入聚合物作为试剂能够提升学生综合应用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力，同时促进学生理解和运用原子经济性和绿色化学的理念，以优化有机合成路线设计及合成过程。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance innovation and interdisciplinary integration in organic chemistry laboratory teaching, we explored the educational significance of employing polymeric reagents in organic chemistry experiments, focusing on two particular examples: the phenolic resin-based Williamson etherification and Claisen rearrangement reactions, and the synthesis of glucose acetates catalyzed by strongly acidic sulfonated polystyrene cation exchange resin. Our teaching research demonstrates that using polymer materials as reagents in organic chemistry experiments improves students' ability to integrate knowledge from organic and polymer chemistry. Additionally, it facilitates students’ understanding and application of the principles of atom economy and green chemistry in the context of designing organic reaction pathways and optimizing synthetic processes.
EN_ZH: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性与跨学科融合性，我们探讨了使用高分子试剂进行有机化学实验的教育意义，并着重介绍了两个具体实例：酚醛树脂为基础的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应，以及强酸性磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂催化合成葡萄糖乙酸酯的反应。我们的教学研究表明，在有机化学实验中使用高分子材料作为试剂，有助于提升学生对有机化学与高分子化学的知识整合能力，促进学生在设计有机反应路径及优化合成过程中对原子经济性和绿色化学原则的理解与应用。

abstract: 为了增强有机化学实验教学的创新性和学科交叉性，探索在有机化学实验中采用高分子试剂的教学意义，针对两个实验展开：以酚醛树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化反应和Claisen重排反应；磺酸化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化葡萄糖乙酸酯的合成。教学研究结果表明：以高分子为试剂的有机化学实验教学可以提高学生交叉运用有机化学和高分子化学知识的能力；在有机反应路线设计和合成工艺优化过程中，有助于促进学生对于反应原子经济性、反应绿色化的理解和运用。
ZH_EN: To enhance innovation and interdisciplinarity in organic chemistry laboratory teaching, we explored the educational significance of incorporating polymeric reagents into organic chemistry experiments, focusing on two experiments: the Williamson etherification and Claisen rearrangement reactions using phenolic resin as the parent substrate, and the synthesis of glucose acetate catalyzed by sulfonated polystyrene cation-exchange resin as a strong acid. Results from teaching studies showed that organic chemistry experiments employing polymeric reagents effectively improved students' ability to integrate their knowledge of organic chemistry and polymer chemistry. Additionally, during the design of organic reaction pathways and optimization of synthetic processes, students' understanding and application of reaction atom economy and green chemistry principles were also enhanced.
EN_ZH: 为提高有机化学实验教学的创新性和交叉性，我们探讨了聚合物试剂引入有机化学实验的教学意义，并重点研究了两个实验：以苯酚树脂为母体底物的Williamson醚化及Claisen重排反应，以及以磺化聚苯乙烯阳离子交换树脂作为强酸催化剂合成葡萄糖乙酸酯的实验。教学研究结果表明，引入聚合物试剂的有机化学实验有效提高了学生整合有机化学与高分子化学知识的能力。此外，在有机反应路径设计和合成工艺优化过程中，学生对反应原子经济性和绿色化学原理的理解与应用能力也得到了加强。

abstract: 化石染料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球出现极端天气。绿色发展理念属于人和自然和谐共处的科学观念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾问题。针对绿色发展的可行性问题进行研究，要求大力发展绿色化学和化工新工艺、新技术，通过多途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而能够在未来的世界竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。
ZH_EN: The combustion of fossil fuels generates the greenhouse gas CO_2, leading to extreme weather events worldwide. The concept of green development is a scientific perspective emphasizing harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, capable of resolving conflicts between environmental protection and development. Research into the feasibility of green development calls for vigorous advancement of green chemistry and new chemical engineering processes and technologies, as well as cultivating chemical professionals through multiple channels. It also calls for stimulating university students' enthusiasm for chemistry, enabling them to contribute to chemical science in future global competition.
EN_ZH: 化石燃料的燃烧产生了温室气体二氧化碳，引发了全球范围内的极端天气事件。绿色发展理念是一种强调人与自然和谐共生的科学观念，能够解决环境保护与发展之间的矛盾。对绿色发展可行性的研究需要大力推进绿色化学和新的化工工艺与技术，多渠道培养化学专业人才。同时，还需要激发大学生对化学的热情，使他们能在未来全球竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。

abstract: 化石染料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球出现极端天气。绿色发展理念属于人和自然和谐共处的科学观念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾问题。针对绿色发展的可行性问题进行研究，要求大力发展绿色化学和化工新工艺、新技术，通过多途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而能够在未来的世界竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。
ZH_EN: Burning fossil fuels produces the greenhouse gas CO₂, leading to extreme weather conditions globally. The concept of green development embodies a scientific view of harmonious coexistence between humans and nature, capable of addressing the conflict between environment and development. Research into the feasibility of green development requires vigorous advancement in green chemistry and new chemical engineering processes and technologies, training chemistry professionals through multiple avenues, and inspiring college students' enthusiasm for chemistry, thus enabling them to contribute to chemical sciences in global competition in the future.
EN_ZH: 燃烧化石燃料会产生温室气体二氧化碳，导致全球极端天气状况。绿色发展的理念体现了人与自然和谐共存的科学观，能够解决环境与发展之间的矛盾。探索绿色发展的可行性需要大力推进绿色化学和新型化工工艺技术的发展，通过多种途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生学习化学的热情，使其在未来全球竞争中为化学科学做出贡献。

abstract: 化石染料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球出现极端天气。绿色发展理念属于人和自然和谐共处的科学观念，能够解决环境与发展的矛盾问题。针对绿色发展的可行性问题进行研究，要求大力发展绿色化学和化工新工艺、新技术，通过多途径培养化学专业人才，激发大学生对化学的热情，从而能够在未来的世界竞争中为化学科学作出贡献。
ZH_EN: Combustion of fossil fuels produces the greenhouse gas CO_2, causing extreme weather globally. The concept of green development embodies a scientific view of harmony between humans and nature, capable of resolving conflicts between environmental conservation and development. Research into the feasibility of green development requires vigorous advancement of new processes and technologies in green chemistry and chemical engineering, fostering chemistry professionals through multiple channels, and stimulating students' enthusiasm for chemistry, thus contributing to chemical science amid future global competition.
EN_ZH: 化石燃料的燃烧会产生温室气体CO_2，导致全球极端气候频发。绿色发展的理念体现了人与自然和谐共存的科学观，能够解决环境保护与发展之间的矛盾。研究绿色发展的可行性需要大力发展绿色化学与化学工程的新工艺和新技术，多渠道培养化学专业人才，激发学生对化学的热情，从而在未来全球竞争中推动化学科学的发展。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: Chinese excellent traditional culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and integrating it into subject teaching has profound significance. Using the CNKI database as the data source and the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this paper conducts visual analysis of China's research papers from the past decade on integrating traditional culture into middle school chemistry teaching, focusing on research trends, hotspots, and frontiers. The research on traditional culture in middle school chemistry teaching has undergone three main development stages, including four research hotspots and three types of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are proposed to broaden and deepen research in this field.
EN_ZH: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学具有深远意义。本文以中国知网（CNKI）数据库为数据源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，对我国近十年来有关传统文化融入初中化学教学的研究论文进行可视化分析，聚焦研究趋势、热点和前沿。研究发现，传统文化在初中化学教学中的研究经历了三个主要发展阶段，形成了四个研究热点和三类研究前沿。最后，提出了拓展与深化该领域研究的实质性建议。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: The excellent traditional Chinese culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and integrating it into subject teaching has profound significance. Using the CNKI database as a data source and employing the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this paper conducts a visual analysis of research papers from the past decade related to the integration of traditional culture into chemistry teaching in Chinese secondary schools, covering dimensions such as research trends, research hotspots, and research frontiers. The findings indicate that the research on traditional culture in secondary-school chemistry teaching has experienced three major stages of development, encompassing four research hotspots and three categories of research frontiers. Finally, substantive suggestions are proposed to broaden and deepen this research field.
EN_ZH: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学具有深远意义。本文以中国知网（CNKI）数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，对近十年来关于中华传统文化融入中学化学教学的研究文献进行可视化分析，涵盖研究趋势、研究热点与研究前沿等维度。研究表明，中学化学教学中传统文化的相关研究经历了三个主要发展阶段，涵盖了四个研究热点，以及三类研究前沿。最后，提出了促进该研究领域拓展与深化的实质性建议。

abstract: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学意义深远。以CNKI数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace,从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿等维度，对近10年我国中学化学教学融入传统文化的研究论文进行可视化分析：传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究共经历3大发展阶段，包含4个研究热点和3类研究前沿；最后为拓宽该研究领域的深广度提出实质性建议。
ZH_EN: Excellent traditional Chinese culture is the spiritual lifeline of the Chinese nation, and integrating it into subject teaching has profound significance. Using the CNKI database as a data source and employing the information visualization tool CiteSpace, this paper conducts a visual analysis of research papers published in China over the past decade on the integration of traditional culture into middle school chemistry education from the perspectives of research trends, research hotspots, and research frontiers. Research on traditional culture in middle school chemistry teaching has experienced three major development stages, involving four research hotspots and three types of research frontiers. Finally, practical suggestions are proposed to broaden and deepen this research field.
EN_ZH: 中华优秀传统文化是中华民族的精神命脉，将其融入学科教学具有重大意义。本研究以中国知网（CNKI）数据库为数据来源，运用信息可视化工具CiteSpace，从研究趋势、研究热点和研究前沿的视角，对我国近十年来传统文化融入中学化学教学的相关研究文献进行可视化分析。研究发现传统文化在中学化学教学中的研究经历了三个主要发展阶段，涉及四个研究热点和三类研究前沿。最后提出了拓宽和深化该研究领域的实践建议。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: In the context of smart classrooms, fostering students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are key objectives of classroom teaching. In junior high school chemistry teaching, teachers can utilize information technology to construct smart classrooms, encouraging students to actively participate in experimental activities, thus promoting the development of their core subject competencies. Consequently, this paper investigates junior high school chemistry experimental teaching within the smart classroom framework. Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, corresponding instructional strategies are proposed from three aspects—pre-class, in-class, and post-class—to facilitate the structured implementation of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively improve its quality.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生创新思维、提高解决实际问题的能力是课堂教学的重要目标。在初中化学教学中，教师可利用信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，从而促进学生学科核心素养的发展。因此，本文针对智慧课堂环境下的初中化学实验教学展开研究。在分析实验教学重要性的基础上，从课前、课中、课后三个方面提出相应的教学策略，以促进化学实验教学的规范实施，有效提升教学质量。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: In the context of smart classrooms, cultivating students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are primary goals of classroom teaching. In junior high school chemistry education, teachers construct smart classrooms through information technology and encourage students to actively participate in experimental activities, which helps facilitate the formation and development of students' core disciplinary competencies. Thus, this paper studies junior high school chemistry experimental teaching within smart classroom environments. Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, corresponding instructional strategies are proposed from three aspects: pre-class, in-class, and post-class. These strategies aim to promote the orderly implementation of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively improve teaching quality.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂环境下，培养学生的创新思维、提升其解决实际问题的能力是课堂教学的主要目标。在初中化学教学中，教师通过信息技术建设智慧课堂，鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的形成与发展。因此，本文对智慧课堂环境下的初中化学实验教学进行研究。在分析实验教学重要性的基础上，从课前、课中、课后三个环节提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学有序开展，并有效提升教学质量。

abstract: 在智慧课堂背景下，培养学生的创新思维、增强学生解决实际问题的能力，是课堂教学的重点目标。对初中化学教学来说，教师通过信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生主动参与实验活动，有助于促进学生学科核心素养的生成和发展。由此，本文对智慧课堂下的初中化学实验教学进行研究，基于对实验教学重要性的分析，从课前、课中及课后三个方面提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学的有序开展，切实提高化学实验教学的质量。
ZH_EN: In the context of smart classrooms, cultivating students' innovative thinking and enhancing their ability to solve practical problems are key objectives of classroom teaching. In junior middle school chemistry instruction, teachers who utilize information technology to build a smart classroom and encourage students' active participation in experimental activities can promote the development of students' core disciplinary competencies. Therefore, this paper studies junior middle school chemistry experimental teaching within the smart classroom environment. Based on an analysis of the importance of experimental teaching, it proposes relevant teaching strategies from three perspectives—before class, during class, and after class—to promote the orderly implementation of chemistry experimental teaching and effectively enhance its quality.
EN_ZH: 在智慧课堂环境下，培养学生的创新思维、提升其解决实际问题的能力是课堂教学的重要目标。在初中化学教学中，教师利用信息技术构建智慧课堂，鼓励学生积极参与实验活动，能够促进学生学科核心素养的发展。因此，本文研究了智慧课堂环境下的初中化学实验教学。在分析实验教学重要性的基础上，从课前、课中和课后三个维度提出了相应的教学策略，以推动化学实验教学有序开展，并有效提升教学质量。
